column7: Individualized instruction in musical expression, language, performance practice, recital, or other specialized repertoire for advanced vocal students by coaching and accompanying faculty. 1 to 2 graduate hours. No professional credit. May be repeated to a maximum of 20 hours. Prerequisite: Permission of instructor.
